title: John Krasinski
summary: John Burke Krasinski (/krəˈzɪnski/;[1] born October 20, 1979) is an American actor, director, producer, and screenwriter. He has received four Primetime Emmy Award nominations and won two Screen Actors Guild Awards. He was named by Time magazine as one of the 100 most influential people in the world in 2018.[2]
